captions.text:
So what would you
like done today?

Oh, nothing special,
I have to shoot off.

-Anywhere special?
-I have a flight to catch.

Yeah. I have a feeling it's
gonna be out of this world.

Sorry to cut this short, sweetheart,
but you've got 5 seconds to get off my planet.

No need to make
this hairy!

Sorry, kid.
I don't make the condition...ers...
I feel like it was the puns!

comments.text:
The holographic display that Tom is playing as in the beginning is 
backwards. This is what it's saying. 

Case: AlphaPunch #19
Species: Manbon
Abilities: Unknown
Hostility ranking: 4
Notes: Subject has taken residence on Earth illegally for six cycles. 
(illegible) been connected to inversion tonight. (illegible) Intercepted 
transmission:
Orders: Immediate (illegible)
Clearance to use deadly force if necessary. 

Got bored. Decided to see what he was reading.﻿
